Private beta · Now open→

Findeverygap.Fixeverythinginonecommand.

CompassPM by Noventra connects to Jira, Notion, Confluence and Slack — scans your workspace for mismatches, then proposes precise multi-file fixes with diff previews and full source citations.

No migrations · Free during beta · Works with your stack

Your stack is powerful — but full of blind spots

The reality

  • PRDs conflict with calls
  • Jira Done, roadmap says Planned
  • Feedback lost in Slack/tickets
  • AI that only generates text

With CompassPM

  • Unified context via RAG
  • Gap Detective finds drift
  • Triage agent clusters themes
  • Composer with diffs + citations

WHY COMPASSPM

From 'we think' to 'we know'

Find the gaps

Gap Detective and Integrity Checker continuously scan Jira, Notion, and feedback for contradictions and missed opportunities.

Fix everything safely

Composer Mode generates minimal unified diffs across PRDs, tickets, and roadmap items. Review, approve, and sync back with full audit trail.

Works on your stack

CompassPM plugs into Jira, Linear, Notion, Confluence, and Slack without replacing them. Zero migration.

THE TEAM INSIDE COMPASSPM

Seven AI agents that actually do the work

Agent

Composer

Generates unified diffs across PRDs, tickets, and roadmap items with full citations.

Agent

Gap Detective

Scans for mismatches between Jira, Notion, and feedback sources.

Agent

Sync Orchestrator

Keeps all connected tools synchronized in real-time.

Agent

Feedback Triage

Clusters and surfaces themes from Slack, tickets, and support channels.

Agent

Roadmap Planner

Maintains alignment between strategic goals and delivery timelines.

Agent

Integrity Checker

Validates consistency across all product documents and artifacts.

Agent

Sprint Groomer

Prepares sprint items with context and acceptance criteria.

HOW IT WORKS

From chaos to clarity in four steps

1

Connect your tools

Securely connect Jira, Linear, Notion, Confluence, and Slack via OAuth.

2

Index your workspace

CompassPM builds a unified map linking feedback to ideas, ideas to roadmap, roadmap to delivery.

3

Agents scan for gaps

Gap Detective, Integrity Checker, and Feedback Triage run on schedule to find drift and missed themes.

4

Review diffs and apply

Composer Mode proposes minimal changes. Review, approve, and sync back with full citations.
